DOC.brief_summary: Registry Study on Biological Disease Profile and Clinical Outcome in Patients with Newly Diagnosed or Existent Lung Cancer The LuCa Biology and Outcome (BiO)-Project
DOC.brief_title: Registry Study on Biological Disease Profile and Clinical Outcome in Patients With Newly Diagnosed or Existent Lung Cancer The LuCa Biology and Outcome (BiO)-Project
DOC.criteria: Patients with suspected diagnosis of lung cancer, or previously diagnosed lung cancer Age â‰¥ 18 years. There is no upper age limit. Severe neurological or psychiatric disorder interfering with ability to give an informed consent No consent for registration, storage and processing of the individual disease characteristics and course as well as information of the family physician about study participation No consent for biobanking of patient's biological specimens and performance of analyses on stored material.
